def give_mid(arr):
    mid_value = arr[0]
    j = 0
    while 2 * j < len(arr):
        mid_value = arr[j]
        j += 1
    return mid_value

def give_mid(arr):
    mid_value = arr[0]
    j = len(arr)
    while 2 * j < len(arr):
        j -= 1
        mid_value = arr[j]
    return mid_value
